begonia rex.watering: Keep soil evenly moist; avoid waterlogging, water about 2-3 times per week.
begonia rex.light: Bright, indirect light; avoid direct sun.
begonia rex.how_to_grow: Place in indirect light, maintain humidity, water when top soil dries slightly.
begonia rex.toxicity: Mildly toxic to pets if eaten.

calathea.watering: Keep soil moist; prefers distilled or filtered water, water about 2-3 times per week.
calathea.light: Medium to bright indirect light; avoid strong direct sunlight.
calathea.how_to_grow: Keep humidity high, water regularly, avoid cold drafts.

chamaedorea ele..watering: Water when top soil dries; avoid soggy soil, water about 1-2 times per week.
chamaedorea ele..how_to_grow: Place in low or medium light, water moderately, maintain steady humidity.

chlorophytum comosum.watering: Water regularly, allow soil to dry slightly between waterings, water about 1-2 times per week.
chlorophytum comosum.light: Bright, indirect light but tolerates lower light.
chlorophytum comosum.how_to_grow: Very easy to grow; thrives with indirect light and occasional watering.

crassula.watering: Water deeply but infrequently; let soil dry completely between waterings, water about 1-2 times per week.
crassula.how_to_grow: Provide lots of light, minimal water, and good drainage.
